##setup
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
#install.packages("")
#devtools::install_github("an-bui/calecopal")

library(data.table)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(readxl)
library(gridExtra)
library(calecopal)
library(rstatix)
library(vars)
library(MuMIn)
library(lme4) #for mixed effects models
library(arm)

select = dplyr::select

source(here::here("scripts", "figure_info.R"))

datver <- "20230316"
dataversion <- paste0("Data_", datver)
```

```{r, echo=F}
wc_all_raw <- read_csv(here("processed-data", paste0("LWC_LFM_WP_dates",datver,".csv")), show_col_types = FALSE) %>% 
  filter(species == "blue oak", 
         lwc_mean < 5)

wc_qudo_df <- wc_all_raw %>% 
   filter(#week > 15, 
         species == "blue oak", 
          lwc_mean < 5, 
         lwc_mean > 0
         ) %>% 
  mutate(lwc = lwc_mean) %>% 
  group_by(tree, week, time) %>% 
  mutate(water_potential = mean(mpa_mean), 
         tree_factor = as.factor(tree)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  mutate(week = case_when(
    week %in% c(13) ~ 14, 
    TRUE ~ week
  )) %>% 
  select(week, time, lwc, water_potential, rwc_percent_y0,
         tree, tree_factor, plot, site, species, date_wp, mean_swc_per_dry_g_y0
        # swc_per_dry_g
         ) %>% 
  unique()
```

```{r}
rwc_raw <- read_csv(here("processed-data", paste0("wp_wc_rwc_",datver,".csv")),show_col_types = FALSE)

rwc_df <-  rwc_raw %>% 
  dplyr::select(week, tree, plot, species, time, date_wp, mpa_mean, lwc_mean, mean_swc_per_dry_g_y0, mean_swc_g_y0, date_rwc) %>% 
  mutate(rwc_percent = (lwc_mean/mean_swc_per_dry_g_y0)*100) %>% 
  drop_na(time)
                    
```


#RWC vs. LWC
```{r, echo=F}
rwc_df  %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = rwc_percent, 
             x= lwc_mean, 
             color = as.factor(week))) +
  geom_point()
```


```{r, echo=F}
rwc_df %>% 
  filter(rwc_percent < 100) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = rwc_percent, 
             x= mpa_mean, 
             color = as.factor(week))) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~time)
```

```{r, echo=F}
rwc_df %>% 
  filter(rwc_percent < 100) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = rwc_percent, 
             x= lwc_mean, 
             color = as.factor(week))) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~time)
```


```{r, echo=F}
rwc_df%>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = rwc_percent, 
             x= week,
             color = as.factor(week))) +
  ggbeeswarm::geom_beeswarm()
```


```{r}
wc_qudo_df %>% 
  filter(year %in% c(0,1), 
        mean_swc_per_dry_g < 5, 
        # swc_percent < 300
         ) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = mean_swc_per_dry_g_y0, 
             x = as.factor(week), 
             color = as.factor(type))) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  facet_wrap(~year) +
  labs(x = "Week", 
       y = "SWC (g water/g dry)", 
       color = "Type") +
  color_two
```
